Text: Thank you again Dirtfrog.  The video is very good but the sound a little...interrupted and patchy.  Thanks all the same...just making a comment to say Thanks and to let others know.

Thanks for your work Dirtfrog. Just a suggestion I would change it to "Motocross GP". I bet more people are searching motocross than mx. People have been asking me if anyone was uploading them. I just found these and tweeted a link for u.
